docs.name: Foreman
docs.info: Foreman v1 is currently the default API version.

methods.name: index

params.name: id
params.validator: Must be an identifier, string from 1 to 128 characters containing only alphanumeric characters, space, underscore(_), hypen(-) with no leading or trailing space.

methods.name: create
examples:
POST /api/lookup_keys
{
  "lookup_key": {
    "key": "testkey",
    "is_param": true
  }
}
201
{
  "lookup_key": {
    "created_at": "2014-01-30T07:24:29Z",
    "default_value": null,
    "description": null,
    "id": 1018350796,
    "is_param": true,
    "key": "testkey",
    "key_type": null,
    "lookup_values_count": 0,
    "override": false,
    "path": "fqdn\nhostgroup\nos\ndomain",
    "puppetclass_id": null,
    "required": false,
    "updated_at": "2014-01-30T07:24:29Z",
    "validator_rule": null,
    "validator_type": null
  }
}

methods.name: update

params.name: id
params.validator: Must be an identifier, string from 1 to 128 characters containing only alphanumeric characters, space, underscore(_), hypen(-) with no leading or trailing space.

methods.name: destroy

params.name: id
params.validator: Must be an identifier, string from 1 to 128 characters containing only alphanumeric characters, space, underscore(_), hypen(-) with no leading or trailing space.

examples:
DELETE /api/lookup_keys/980190962-port
200
{
  "lookup_key": {
    "created_at": "2014-01-30T07:24:13Z",
    "default_value": "80",
    "description": null,
    "id": 980190962,
    "is_param": true,
    "key": "port",
    "key_type": "integer",
    "lookup_values_count": 0,
    "override": false,
    "path": "fqdn\nhostgroup\nos\ndomain",
    "puppetclass_id": null,
    "required": false,
    "updated_at": "2014-01-30T07:24:13Z",
    "validator_rule": null,
    "validator_type": null
  }
}
